casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carlton DAVIS. No. 492PO4-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of May 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-28(A)(1)(2)(3)(4)":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
